text:
VP Marketing & Demand Gen | Toronto, ON | Full-time on-site | HigherMe

HigherMe helps food and retail businesses find, screen, and hire better employees faster. We're a team of 25 looking to add an experienced marketer who is ready to get their hands dirty and help create some explosive growth. The VP Marketing and Demand Gen will work out of Toronto office, while possibly representing the company at conferences throughout North America.

Full job details on AngelList: https://angel.co/higherme/jobs/348459-vp-of-marketing-and-gr...
